name: PACMAN - Perception Experiment
description:
This game was created by students - @b3aribeiro and @ac.harkness - from The New School as part of their Perception in Virtual Worlds class. It's an adaptation of noobtuts's Pacman tutorial and Game Internals' Ghost AI article.

Give it a try and please take the time to answer the survey at the end of your trial. Your feedback is important as it will help on our research. Thank you!
